languages.text: Техноматы проводят ритуал окуривания священного энерготрансформатора, но духи машины бушуют и не поддаются на уговоры.

traits.locale_text: [драфт] 2 оператора пытаются починить сломанный генератор, но безуспешно

languages.text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.
languages.original_text: Техноматы проводят ритуал окуривания священного энерготрансформатора, но духи машины бушуют и не поддаются на уговоры.

traits.locale_text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be coaxed.
The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be coaxed.
The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.

The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.

languages.text: Los tecnómatas están realizando un rito incensario en el sagrado transformador de energía, pero los espíritus máquina están desbocados y se niegan a calmarse.
languages.original_text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.

traits.locale_text: Los tecnómatas están realizando un rito incensario en el sagrado transformador de energía, pero los espíritus máquina están desbocados y se niegan a calmarse.

languages.text: テクノマットは神聖な電源トランスに儀式を施している。しかし、機械精霊は暴れまわっており、動じていない。
languages.original_text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.

traits.locale_text: テクノマットは神聖な電源トランスに儀式を施している。しかし、機械精霊は暴れまわっており、動じていない。

languages.text: 技工正在神圣的变电器上举行焚香仪式，但机魂非常暴躁，完全不肯接受安抚。
languages.original_text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.

traits.locale_text: 技工正在神圣的变电器上举行焚香仪式，但机魂非常暴躁，完全不肯接受安抚。

languages.text: Die Technomaten führen einen Weihrauchritus an dem heiligen Stromtransformator durch, aber die Maschinengeister sind außer Kontrolle und lassen sich nicht beeinflussen.
languages.original_text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.

traits.locale_text: Die Technomaten führen einen Weihrauchritus an dem heiligen Stromtransformator durch, aber die Maschinengeister sind außer Kontrolle und lassen sich nicht beeinflussen.

languages.text: Les technomates accomplissent un rituel sur le transformateur électrique sacré, mais les esprits de la machine semblent déchaînés et refusent visiblement de se laisser faire.
languages.original_text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.

traits.locale_text: Les technomates accomplissent un rituel sur le transformateur électrique sacré, mais les esprits de la machine semblent déchaînés et refusent visiblement de se laisser faire.

languages.text: Teknomatlar, kutsal güç trafosu üzerinde tütsü ayini düzenliyor. Ancak makine ruhları kontrolden çıkarak hiçbir emri tanımıyor.
languages.original_text: The technomats are performing a censing rite on the sacred power transformer, but the machine spirits are running rampant and will not be swayed.
